mapper.insert: insert into orders(order_id, owner_name, wantname, wantamount, givename, giveamount) value(#{order_id}, #{owner_name},#{wantname},#{wantamount}, #{givename},#{giveamount});
mapper.select: select * from orders order by wantname
select * from orders where givename=#{givename} order by (giveamount/wantamount) desc
select * from orders where givename=#{c_name} and not owner_name=#{user_name} order by (giveamount/wantamount) desc
select * from orders where wantname=#{wantname} order by (wantamount/giveamount) asc
select * from orders where wantname=#{c_name} and not owner_name=#{user_name} order by (wantamount/giveamount) asc
